This App was created as an assignment of the Subject PH 3037 - Mobile Application Development. Yahoo Weather Api has been used to create this App. This App gives the current weather conditions of a city and 5 day forecast of that city. You can change the city by entering city name in the search bar and selecting a suitable city name. The city list is auto filtered for the easy of use. You can View more details of forecast by selecting it. There is a refresh button on the title bar if the information is not loaded properly to refresh. You can change the temperature unit From Celsius to Fahrenheit and vise versa from the simple switch. You can preset you favorite city and your preferred temperature unit from settings menu.
Special Thanks for Sir Gayan Akmeemana For Guiding through out this project. And to Yoel Nunaz who provided the Tutorial guides to develop this app. Thank You.
